bug.author: JakobMadsenICP
bug.description: I am using mpiexec -n 2 cntk configfile=FindWaldo.cntk in a Command prompt (as described in <denchmark-link:https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/cognitive-toolkit/Multiple-GPUs-and-machines>https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/cognitive-toolkit/Multiple-GPUs-and-machines</denchmark-link> ) With version 2.4 The output in the CMD is now not possible to read. I am getting an output as below. s s a a m m p p l l e e s s P P e e r r S S e e c c o o n n d d

comments.comment: Same problem in CNTK-2-5 Release GPU
Same problem in CNTK-2-5-1 Release GPU
